title: FS: A Few Low to Mid-Grade T206 HOFers and Commons
author: Tim Zwick

posts.post_title: FS: A Few Low to Mid-Grade T206 HOFers and Commons
posts.post_content:
From a recently uncovered dormant collection - these have not been in the hobby for over three decades. Check, MO, PayPal F/F, PayPal w/invoice & Cash all OK. Prices are net to me. $3 for 1st Class Postage for one card or all........

EVERS – PORTRAIT – GD.......$125 SOLD
CHANCE – PORTRAIT – GD......$100 SOLD
LAJOIE – THROWING – PR/FR.........$125 SOLD
WADDELL – THROWING – FR......$100
GANDIL – SWEET CAP 350/460 – PR p/h........$50 SOLD
CHASE – DARK CAP – SWEET CAP 350 – GD........$30SOLD
KONETCHY – GLOVE NEAR GROUND – SWEET CAP 350/460                  
                     w/OVERPRINT – VG/EX.......$80
BURCH (FIELDING) – SWEET CAP 350 – VG/EX.......$45
MADDOX – SWEET CAP 350 – VG.......$35
MCCORMICK – PIEDMONT – VG......$35
DOOLAN – PIEDMONT (PENCIL ON BACK – 2 NAMES) o/w VG...$30
JONES – PIEDMONT – VG/EX........$45 SOLD
Will also take Jones and Chase
I’ll take the Evers and Chance, sending a pm
